trans-unit.source: Supplies base class implementation for all activity designer theme classes used in a workflow design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 디자인 타임 환경에서 사용 되는 모든 activity designer 테마 클래스에 대 한 클래스 구현을 기본를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] All classes that supply theme property settings to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes must inherit from the DesignerTheme class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>클래스는 DesignerTheme 클래스에서 상속 해야</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> 하는 테마 속성 설정을 제공 하는 모든 클래스

trans-unit.source: Designer themes provide a set of property values with which to display background and foreground colors and styles, fonts, and other style settings for the designer classes displayed on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마는 배경 및 전경 색 및 스타일, 글꼴 및 워크플로 디자인 화면에 표시 되는 디자이너 클래스에 대 한 기타 스타일 설정을 표시 하는 속성 값의 집합을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> class also inherits from DesignerTheme.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>DesignerTheme에서 클래스 상속.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> class by using a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 구현 된 경우의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"> </xref> 클래스를 사용 하 여 한 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> with which the designer theme is associated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"> </xref> 디자이너 테마가 연결 된 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마가 적용 되는 디자이너 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyTo property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer.
trans-unit.target: ApplyTo 속성 디자이너 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 사용 하 여 디자이너 테마는 디자이너와 연결 하는 동안는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A>속성을 사용 하 여 디자이너 테마를 디자이너 형식과 연결 된 <xref:System.Type>디자이너의.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마가 적용 되는 디자이너 형식의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: A user attempted a set operation when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*> property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자는 set 작업을 시도한 경우는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*>속성이로 설정 된 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow theme that encapsulates the designer theme.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마를 캡슐화 하는 워크플로 테마를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The ContainingTheme property returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> object that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> used during initialization.
trans-unit.target: ContainingTheme 속성은 반환 된 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>개체를 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A>초기화 하는 동안 사용 되는.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"> </xref> 연관 된 개체는 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the designer associated with the designer theme.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마와 연결 된 디자이너의 유형을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerType property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type.
trans-unit.target: DesignerType 속성 사용 하 여 디자이너 테마를 디자이너 형식과 연결 된 <xref:System.Type>디자이너 동안는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A>속성 디자이너 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 사용 하 여 디자이너 테마는 디자이너와 연결 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Possible values for this property include <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, and any classes created by activity designer developers that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에 대 한 가능한 값에는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, 및 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> 에서 상속 하는 활동 디자이너 개발자가 만든 클래스가</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the designer to be associated with the current designer theme.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>현재 디자이너 테마와 연결할 디자이너를 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A user attempted a set operation when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*> property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자는 set 작업을 시도한 경우는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*>속성이로 설정 된 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"> </xref> 관리 되는 리소스를 선택적으로 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>관리 되는 관리 되지 않는 리소스만 해제 하려면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 만 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Allows the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> to attempt to free resources and perform other clean-up operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 허용 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"> </xref> 리소스를 해제 하 고 가비지 수집에서 회수 하기 전에 다른 정리 작업을 수행 하려고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Finalize releases only unmanaged resources prior to garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 가비지 수집 이전만 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제를 완료 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Performs further initialization tasks beyond those performed by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 초기화 작업에서 수행 하는 것 이상의 추가 수행 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> class provides no default behavior for this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>클래스는이 메서드에 대 한 기본 동작이 없습니다를 제공 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> must provide their own logic for this method.
trans-unit.target: 상속 된 클래스 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>이 메서드에 대 한 고유 논리를 제공 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer theme class that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마 클래스를 디자이너에 대 한 앰비언트 속성 설정이 변경 되었음을 알립니다.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> use this method to make necessary changes when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration value changes from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 상속 된 클래스 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>사용 될 때이 메서드를 필요한 변경 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>하거나 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> 에서 열거형 값이 변경</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration determines where a designer theme obtains its ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>열거형은 디자이너 테마가 앰비언트 속성 설정을 가져올 위치를 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>값은 설정 되 면 디자이너 테마 클래스에서 앰비언트 설정을 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A>속성.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the operating system on which the designer is installed.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>값은 설정 되 면 디자이너 테마 클래스는 디자이너가 설치 된 운영 체제에서 앰비언트 설정을 가져옵니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"></xref> enumeration value that the designer theme should now use.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"> </xref> 디자이너 테마가 사용 해야 하는 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer theme is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 테마가 읽기 전용인 지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> is initialized with is not a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), ReadOnly obtains its value from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>하는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>초기화 되는 null 참조 (`Nothing` Visual Basic의), 읽기 전용에서 값을 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is a null reference (`Nothing`), ReadOnly is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>가 null 참조 (`Nothing`), 읽기 전용은 `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is assigned to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, the ReadOnly property is set to `true`, and properties on all designer themes associated with this theme cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>에 할당 되는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, ReadOnly 속성이로 설정 되어 `true`,이 테마와 연결 된 모든 디자이너 테마의 속성을 변경할 수 없습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>

trans-unit.source: If required, properties can be set after loading the theme but before assigning it to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 테마를 로드 한 후 하지만 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A> 을 할당 하기 전에 속성을 설정할 수, 필요한 경우

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"> </xref> 읽기 전용, 되지 않았으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 관련 확보, 해제 또는 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 다시 설정 된 응용 프로그램 정의 작업을 수행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This version of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 이 버전의 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>구현 하는 <xref:System.IDisposable>인터페이스.</xref:System.IDisposable> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>
